page.shortlink: api sql namespace database snapshot class to excel method
page.description: Create an Excel 2003 workbook with a sheet for each table in the snapshot.

argument.name: IncludeHeadings
argument.description: Optional. Default value is *[xb:.t.]*. If *[xb:.t.]*, headings will be included. If *[xb:.f.]*, headings will be omitted.
